Master's degree in Agro-environmental Law from the Federal University of Mato Grosso. Bachelor's degree in Law from the Federal University of Mato Grosso. Member of the research group "Balanced work environment as a component of decent work" and the Interdisciplinary Environmental Research Group - GIPA (2019 - present). Lawyer. Legal advisor at the Specialized Prosecutor's Office for Environmental Defense and Urban Planning in the Public Prosecutor's Office of the State of Mato Grosso (2018 - Mar. 2024 - Nov. 2024 - present). Legal advisor at the Support Center for Appeals to Superior Courts (NARE) in the Public Prosecutor's Office of the State of Mato Grosso.


:::
